sure-this-action-cannot-be-undone-click-: Sure? This action cannot be undone. Click again to confirm.
name: Name
please-select-at-least-one-agent: Please select at least one agent
generate-completions-description-2: is relevant to your business, you can generate completions for it to add more context to your agents when answering similar conversations in the future.
after-generating-completions: After generating completions, you can approve, edit or discard them.
select-agents-that-will-retrain: Select the agents that will retrain on this conversation. Keep in mind that each agent will generate its own completions based on its system prompt.
you-can-use-this-page-to-train-your-mode: You can use this page to train your model with files.
a-completion-is-a-pair-of-a-prompt-and-a: A completion is a pair of a prompt and an answer. You can use this page to train your model with completions.
settings-description: You can change the language of the app here.
share-conversation-description: You can share this conversation with the entire world by generating a public link. Set a datetime for expiration, by default it will be 30 days.
chunks-mode-help-text: In chunks mode, the AI will receive a **n quantity** of chunks from the document depending of the user query.
all-content-mode-help-text: In **all content** mode, the AI will receive all the possible text from the document depending of the available prompt tokens for the next iteration.
no-organizations-message: You don't have any organizations yet. Create one to share conversations with your team, creating training AI models collaboratively and more.
max-memory-messages-description: The maximum number of messages that will be passed as context for the agents in the current conversation. The oldest messages will be automatically deleted. Default: 10.
speech-being-generated-wait-a-second: Speech being generated, wait a second...
explain-its-role-to-the-ai: Explain its role to the AI
document-templates-you-can-replicate-usi: Document templates you can replicate using AI
searching-similar-information-in-the-dat: Searching similar information in the database...
login-description: Sign in to your account to continue your conversations and access all your tools.
account-deactivated-description: Your account has been deactivated by your organization administrator. You can no longer access this platform. Please contact your administrator if you believe this is a mistake.
password-min-length: Password must be at least 8 characters
auto-play-description: Automatically play messages when they are generated.
auto-scroll-description: Automatically scroll to the bottom of the chat when a new message is being generated.
signup-open-description: Sign up to start using the platform. You'll create your own organization and can invite others later.
use-valid-signup-link: Please use a valid signup link with an organization ID to register.
organization-not-found: Organization not found. Please use a valid signup link.
multiagentic-modality-description: In grupal mode, each agent can see the context of the other agents. In isolated mode, each agent can only see its own context.
select-at-least-one-agent-to-chat: Select at least one agent to chat
organization-description: Here you can manage your organization
why-user-info-matters-for-ai-personaliza: Give information about the user to the AI helps personalize the responses. You can decide in any conversation if you want to give information about your user or not.
network-error: Network error: Check your internet connection and try again.
title: Title
select-documents-from-your-collections: You can select specific documents from each of your collections
use-completions-active-explanation: Completions is active, the AI will use the passed documents and its own knowledge to answer the user query.
use-completions-inactive-explanation: Completions is inactive, the AI will only use its own knowledge to answer the user query.
the-completions-configuration-do-not-aff: The completions configuration do not affect the documents used, only specifies if completions are used.
are-you-trying-to-make-me-speak-twice: Are you trying to make me speak twice?
isolated-modality-description: In isolated mode, each agent receives only its messages, it doesn't know about the other agents in the conversation.
grupal-modality-description: In grupal mode, each agent can see the context of the other agents. They can also interact with each other because they can see the messages of the other agents.
mermaid-theme-description: The theme to use for the mermaid diagrams. You can ask the AI to generate diagrams using *mermaid syntax*.
video-generated-please-reload: Video generated, please reload the conversation to see it!
out-of-compute-units: Out of compute units, please buy more to continue using our services!
calculator-description: This plugin performs mathematical operations on numbers. The AI model can concatenate different operations to perform complex calculations.
mermaid-diagrams-description: This plugin generates Mermaid diagrams from text. The AI model can generate diagrams from text descriptions. Just ask the modal what you want to generate.
document-maker-description: This plugin generates a document from a markdown code block. The AI model can generate a document from a markdown code block. Just ask the modal what you want to generate.
choose-the-name-of-your-organization: Choose the name of your organization
max-organizations-reached: You have reached the maximum number of organizations allowed. Please delete some organizations to create a new one.
api-keys-description: These are the API keys for the services you are using. You can find them in the settings of the service.
transcription-job-initialized: Transcription job initialized! It will appear down soon üëáüèª
you-need-to-record-something-first: You need to record something first
you-need-to-upload-an-audio-file-first: You need to upload an audio file first
youtube-url-required: You need to enter a YouTube URL first
please-enter-voice-id-and-name: Please enter voice id and name
no-alert-rules-found: No alert rules found. Create your first one!
trigger-description-placeholder: Describe when this alert should be triggered...
confirm-delete-alert-rule: Are you sure you want to delete this alert rule?
conversation-title-prompt-placeholder: Leave empty to use default prompt. Customize how titles are generated for conversations using this agent.
no-tags-found: No tags found. Create your first one!
confirm-delete-tag: Are you sure you want to delete this tag?
invite-link-description: Share this link so others can sign up and join your organization.
no-members-yet: No members yet. Member list will appear here when the backend is ready.
no-roles-yet: No roles yet. Create one to assign to members.
confirm-delete-role: Are you sure you want to delete this role?
ff-manage-organization-desc: Allows the user to manage organization settings, members, and roles.
ff-alert-rules-manager-desc: Create and manage conversation alert rules for the organization.
ff-tags-management-desc: Create and manage conversation tags for the organization.
ff-conversations-dashboard-desc: Access the conversations dashboard to view and analyze all organization conversations.
ff-edit-organization-agent-desc: Edit the configuration of agents owned by the organization.
ff-conversation-analysis-desc: Enables automatic AI analysis of conversations (organization-level only).
ff-chat-widgets-management-desc: Create and manage embeddable chat widgets for agents.
ff-train-agents-desc: Upload documents and train agents with custom knowledge.
ff-audio-tools-desc: Access audio processing tools like transcription and text-to-speech.
ff-image-tools-desc: Access image generation and editing tools.
ff-video-tools-desc: Access video generation and processing tools.
ff-web-scraping-desc: Enable web scraping capabilities to extract content from URLs.
ff-add-files-to-chat-desc: Upload and attach files to chat conversations.
ff-transcribe-on-chat-desc: Enable voice-to-text transcription directly in the chat input.
ff-chat-generate-speech-desc: Generate speech audio from assistant messages.
ff-multi-agent-chat-desc: Enable conversations with multiple AI agents simultaneously.
ff-manage-llm-desc: Add, configure, and delete LLM model connections.
ff-set-agent-ownership-desc: Transfer agent ownership to the organization.
confirm-deactivate-member-description: Are you sure you want to deactivate {{name}}? They will lose access to all organization resources but can be reactivated later.
confirm-reactivate-member-description: Are you sure you want to reactivate {{name}}? They will regain access to the organization.
confirm-remove-member-description: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from the organization? This will delete their role assignments and alert subscriptions. This action cannot be undone.
no-organization-to-manage: You don't have an organization you can manage.
create-or-join-organization-in-settings: Create or join an organization in Settings.
widget-manager-description: Create embeddable chat widgets for your agents. Add the embed code to any website to enable AI-powered chat.
no-widgets-found: No widgets found. Create your first one!
knowledge-base-description: Manage your documents and completions to train your AI agents.
no-documents-yet: No documents yet. Upload your first document to get started.
completions-hint: Completions are generated from conversations and documents. Train on a conversation or document to create completions.
drag-drop-or-click-to-upload: Drag & drop files here or click to upload
profile-helptext: This information helps the AI personalize its responses for you. It is optional but recommended.
view-only-mode: You are viewing this conversation in read-only mode. Only the owner can send messages or edit.
landing-hero-description: AI is changing our lives. Our focus is to let you create professional-grade AI agents, customized to your unique needs.
landing-mockup-chat-1: Hi, how can I help you?
landing-mockup-chat-2: I want to create an agent for my business
landing-mockup-chat-3: Sure. You can set it up in under 5 minutes...
landing-mockup-alert-1: Charly reserved a room for two
landing-mockup-whatsapp-in: Hi, I want info about pricing
landing-create-agents-description: Focus on what matters. We take care of the rest. Create AI agents with your data, then use them to answer WhatsApp messages, create videos, documents, and much more.
landing-manage-relationships-title: Manage client and team relationships the smart way
landing-manage-relationships-description: Masscer AI helps you nurture relationships with your clients and team members in the smartest way. Stay on top of conversations, get AI insights, and scale your communication without losing the human touch.
landing-embed-website-title: Add an AI agent to your website in under 5 minutes
landing-embed-website-description: Have a website? Embed a chat widget with your AI agent and start attending visitors in minutes. No coding required‚Äîcopy, paste, and you're live.
landing-automate-whatsapp-description: Let your AI agent handle customer inquiries, support tickets, and conversations 24/7.
landing-generate-media-description: We focus on making the creative process easier and more productive.
ff-agent-task-desc: Allows running AI agents with tool execution capabilities in conversations.
